name: Demons Can't Keep Me Down on Earth
name_original: Demons Can't Keep Me Down on Earth
description:
Unreal MegaJam 2019

You awake to find yourself in a deep pit and you must get out! Head to the platform and ride the elevator up to freedom! However, demon dogs will spawn and they will spawn blocks above you head that will weight the elevator down and attempt to crash your whole elevator back down to Earth! Destroy the dogs, destroy the blocks, and survive to the top.

You can do it!
